title: CCG LF TOP LANER PLAT/DIAMOND OOL
body:
Hey guys, Crowd Control Gaming are currently looking for a STRONG top lane main.
CCG are a proud gaming organisation with access to a ts server and potential coaching.
REQUIREMENTS-
1.  Be up to date with current meta.
2. Great communication skills.
3. Positive attitude and willingness to learn.
4. Available most nights throughout the week from 6pm-10pm but also having time to work on your solo queue.
5. Must be able to play in various tournaments such as OOL and Summoners society etc.
6. Plat/Diamond Solo queue rank.
If you are interested and would like a chance to trial you can message me on league CCG Toxicidez.
cheers guys.

replies.body: any chance youre looking for jg sub, been looking to join a team for a while, diamond

Hey dude, sorry for the late reply, do you have me on league? if so we can talk more there.
cheers brother
